verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:10
verses.text: And when the year was expired, king Nebuchadnezzar sent, and brought him to Babylon, with the goodly vessels of the house of the Lord, and made Zedekiah his brother king over Judah and Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:11
verses.text: Zedekiah was one and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned eleven years in Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 36:12
verses.text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord his God, and humbled not himself before Jeremiah the prophet speaking from the mouth of the Lord.
